text: The 1996 MLB Japan All-Star Series was the fifth edition of the championship, a best-of-eight series between the All-Star teams from Major League Baseball (MLB) and Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB), then-called All-Japan. MLB won the series by 4–2–2 and Steve Finley was named MVP. == Results == Championship {| class="wikitable" |- ! Game !! Winning Team !! Score !! Losing Team !!
